channel.title: MSIX packaging on Jason Scheirer
channel.description: Recent content in MSIX packaging on Jason Scheirer

item.title: So You Want to Make an MSIX?
item.description:
I’ve spend the first just-under-a-year at Notion working on the desktop team. I was hired, strangely enough, as a “Windows guy” after over a decade of absence from the platform.

The largest single deliverable in this time by far has been providing an MSIX packaged Windows distribution for the main Desktop product.
